name: Steam Factory
description:
Story:
In the world of Ancar the technology advanced based on the conversion of a smoke expelled by the nucleus of the planet into energy. Large factories were built around the globe to store and convert this smoke into clean, cheap, and eternal energy.

The inhospitable environment inside the factories where complex chemical reactions took place prevented human labor. Colossus was created an independent artificial intelligence capable of managing all the production and maintenance of the smoke factories.
In the city of Saint Paul one of the factories cut off communication and power supply, Xavier Pontes, a mercenary whose mind is trapped in the XPL-0R4T0R (XPL) robot, a machine designed for exploration of inhospitable areas, his mission is to identify the malfunction of the Colossus and restore the management system to its normal.
Time: Twentieth-century period (1901-2000) - The story takes place in the mid-1940s - Alternative reality. Location: Ancar's fictional world - In a city inspired by Saint Paul (Saint Paul) - All the narrative takes place inside a factory.
The story begins at the factory entrance, passing through three environments to the nucleus where the antagonist is.
